alert.note: Alert for Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wind and additional light snowfall accumulations will cause heavy drifting snow and low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...The Teton Valley, including the towns of Ashton, Tetonia, and Driggs. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Heavily drifting snow will overcome snow removal efforts on roads and highways, causing temporary road closures. Check road conditions before heading out to First Night or New Year`s Eve events.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
